programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: An attempt is made to fix the blinking sun of Seefra, but Trance is replaced by a doppelganger.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost Soul
programme.desc: In 1985, 25-year-old Luana 'La Verne' Williams disappeared from her Tauranga home. Eight years later her disappearance was upgraged to a murder enquiry. Her body has never been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Looking for Justice
programme.desc: This week, for the first time ever, the prime suspect in a murder enquiry has turned to Sensing Murder for help.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Michael Kanaan: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Michael Kanaan was an angry young man in a hurry to make a name for himself in Sydney’s underworld. But his volatile temper and penchant for violence soon led him to kill three men before he was finally captured in a wild shootout with Sydney police.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Snowtown: Bodies in the Barrels
programme.desc: In 1999, eight bodies are found in six barrels filled with acid in a former bank vault in rural Snowtown, 50 kilometres north of Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.desc: In 1965, when Australian teenage culture was centred on sun, sand, and surf, the nation was shocked by the brutal bashing, rape and murder of two 15-year-old girls in the sand hills at Sydney's Wanda Beach.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Reaching Out
programme.desc: Jodi questions her sanity when she is haunted by visions of her ancestor Emma McLeod and a murdered convict. Patrick accidentally destroys a historic trophy belonging to Drovers Run.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Returned Favour
programme.desc: Riley and Matt both declare their love for Jodi, but who will she choose? Stevie risks losing Alex when she helps Marcus with a secret cattle deal. Jodi's horse Tucker is bitten by a tiger snake.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Of Hearts and Hunters
programme.desc: Jodi faces a gut-wrenching decision when Matt is forced back into witness protection - will she choose love over Drovers Run? It's sibling rivalry gone mad when Marcus and Alex compete to woo Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Climb Every Mountain
programme.desc: Kate uncovers the shocking truth about Jodi and Matt's murder. Meg returns for Jodi's funeral with a bizarre secret. Alex takes drastic action to prove how much he loves Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Sisters Are Doing It For Themselves
programme.desc: Regan tries to reconcile with her wild-at-heart sister Grace McLeod, after Grace inherits part-ownership of Drovers Run. Riley is seduced by a sexy cowgirl, with disastrous results while Kate is determined to prove her bizarre farming methods to Marcus.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Alex's plan to propose to Stevie goes horribly wrong, when a series of accidents and disasters threaten to ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dark Shadows
programme.desc: The TAPS' team is called out to Newport, RI to hold the first ever-paranormal investigation at Seaview Terrace; best recognized from the TV show Dark Shadows.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Public Poltergeist Number 1
programme.desc: The historic Old Lake County Jail was once considered to be inescapable... until notorious gangster John Dillinger, escaped from it in 1934. Over 80 years later, aggressive prisoners are breaking free as sealed areas.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Well of Horror
programme.desc: TAPS is joined by Jason's daughter, Haily, on two cases; The Shanley Hotel in Napanoch, New York and Old Fort Niagara, in Youngstown, New York. Both cases involve a gruesome death that took place at a well, instigating paranormal activity.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Family of Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Mt. Pleasant, South Carolina to help the USS Yorktown's crew figure out if the paranormal activity they are experiencing points to their fallen heroes.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Ghost Hasn't Left the Building
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Amy is back! TAPS travels to Shreveport, Louisiana to investigate the historic Shreveport Auditorium, a place famous for introducing Elvis and other rock n' rolls stars to the world.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If You Knew Nunu
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jonah is Missing
programme.desc: Dog and the team search for Jonah, a violent and desperate criminal facing?20 years in jail. The trail goes stale when Dog runs into evasive family members and an angry girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Suga On My Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog and the team go after Kandice, AKA Candy, AKA Suga, a stripper who didn't make her court appearance. They convince one of her friends to lure her to a supermarket parking lot, where Dog has an easy time fetching the fetching young thing. But then

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mothers and Daughters
programme.desc: Dog and Beth take on the heartbreaking case of Rachel. Rachel's mom bailed her out of jail on condition that she go to AA meetings and stick to a curfew. But Rachel hasn't kept up her end of the bargain, and now her mother wants her back to jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dog Is Smokin'
programme.desc: Dog is trying to cut down on smoking, but it's not easy with his high-stress job. Today, he must track down Walter, a fugitive who believes that the Canadian military has planted a chip in his tooth that allows him to communicate with his van.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Snooze, You Lose
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Do Unto Others
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Boomerang Becca
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si gets sick, he seeks the help of Ms. Kay to take care of him.

programme.title: Timber Kings: The Getaway
programme.desc: As winter approaches, the rush to build two summer getaway homes is on. Peter leads his team in Alberta while Bryan Jr. and his guys head north to Alaska.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Great Expectations
programme.desc: In upstate New York, Beat builds three grandiose gazebos for two brothers with neighbouring properties. Back home, Bryan Jr. asks his son Little Man to take charge of his first build ever.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Planes, Cranes and Automobiles
programme.desc: Beat takes on his biggest build this season, a 15,000 square foot mansion with logs so massive they tax the crane and crew to the limits.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Good As New
programme.desc: On a two-man build in Alberta, Joel and his right-hand man Shawn are challenged by broken logs and stubborn headers.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Barn Burner
programme.desc: After Beat and Sam build a beautiful home in Alberta, the clients egg them on to a paint ball battle on their acreage.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. He’s tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drunk in Love
programme.desc: Cheryl Kaplan is fed up with Cody Green’s drinking. She says Cody is unaffectionate and believes he’s cheating. The final straw was when they lost their home and he pressured her to leave behind her daughter in Ohio to live with his family.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Tamale
programme.desc: Madeline says Edward is more of a detective than a husband. Edward says anytime Madeline is upset, she takes it out by destroying property in the house. She has destroyed an entire apartment and he can’t take it anymore.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Coming to America
programme.desc: Keith claims he is married to two other women overseas and plans to bring them over! Paw'lla says Keith is a fake pastor who doesn't know what he's talking about! Keith says he has a master plan for all of these wives!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy Sexy Cool
programme.desc: Stephen says Kisha is crazy and can snap in a split second, especially with his mom. He claims she accuses him of cheating, but Kisha is the one bit obsessed with one of her exes still.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Enough Is Enough
programme.desc: Dwight has had it with Roxy's mental abuse. Dwight says Roxy has cost him multiple jobs because she's constantly harassing him at work, but she says he needs to give her the attention she deserves! Can Judge Toler help them see eye to eye?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Alcohol
programme.desc: Nikkinba says Muriel is controlling and constantly breaking his phones. He wouldn't return Muriel's calls for days until he quit his job and said that he's leaving her to live in North Carolina. Can they settle down or will he buy a one-way ticket?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Pour Up Drank
programme.desc: Floyd Steven’s jealousy is leading Alqueisha “Quey” Benjamin to consider breaking it off. Quey is becoming an alcoholic because of his controlling ways, but Floyd has caught her in a few lies and suspects her of cheating!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Back Seat of My Jeep
programme.desc: Bumping in the night in the back seat of his jeep has caused all our problems! Kelsey says Justin cheats, doesn’t pay bills and is always angry. Justin argues that she’s a liar and doesn’t help around the house ever.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: God Looks on the Heart
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Brother
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk hold the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mid-Course Correction
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby's Back in Town
programme.desc: Dog tries to nab a fugitive, named Wayne, by calling and telling him that he's won a new vacuum cleaner and he should stick around to get it. Dog then sends his daughter, Lyssa, to "deliver" the vacuum cleaner and lure Wayne out of his house.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Ice in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Run's House: Say Hello To My Little Friend
programme.desc: When Russy decides he wants to be a magician, Rev is concerned he might be taking on one too many hobbies. With JoJo's help, the Great Russini is a BIG hit!

programme.title: Run's House: Hawaiian Vacation
programme.desc: Rev forgets to tell Uncle Russell that JoJo will miss work for a family vacation. Angela and Vanessa try to help cousin Jessica meet a guy. Russy is afraid to go surfing after he loses his ancient shark tooth necklace.

programme.title: Run's House: Run's Big House
programme.desc: Rev and family rally around JoJo after he gets busted for possession of marijuana.

programme.title: Run's House: The Secret of My Excess
programme.desc: The boys' wastefulness triggers a cleaning rampage by Rev. Meanwhile, Russy gets obsessive about training for his blue belt in karate.

programme.title: Run's House: Blog Wild
programme.desc: Rev tricks the girls into coming back East for work so that he and Justine can spend time with them. JoJo helps Diggy bring more traffic to his blog.

programme.title: Run's House: Tapper's Delight
programme.desc: Vanessa and Angela nurture Russy's new passion: tap dancing. Diggy plays his sisters into getting him a mini-fridge for his bedroom. Rev tries to babyproof the house.

programme.title: Run's House: An Office He Can't Refuse
programme.desc: Rev tries to become an office worker at the remarkable Global Grind. Diggy's clean freak behavior borders on germaphobia.

programme.title: Run's House: Mother Smother
programme.desc: Diggy and Russy get annoyed by their Mom getting in their business while older siblings Angela and Vanessa don't mind Justine's ways. JoJo helps Rev find a new wardrobe.

programme.title: Run's House: The Puppy Whisperer
programme.desc: Justine and the boys try to train their dog Pal to convince Rev they're worthy of another dog. JoJo cooks healthy fried chicken for his parents.

programme.title: Run's House: Hall of Fame
programme.desc: Rev tries to figure out what Run DMC getting inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame is all about. Angela and Vanessa celebrate the 2-year anniversary for Pastry.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Woman in the Window
programme.desc: Ryan and his team lend paranormal assistance to a family who lives in a historic home that was once a part of the Underground Railroad. Does the answer to their haunting lie in the mysterious tunnels beneath the house?

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger
programme.desc: Kelli and her husband Riley are frightened in their coastal Oregon home. They are plagued by a headless apparition and often hear mysterious noises that resemble cries for help from the dark corners of their house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghosts of the Forgotten
programme.desc: The PRS investigation into the haunted Lake County Poor House becomes a journey through one PRS team members? troubled past.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Homecoming
programme.desc: Ryan brings PRS to his hometown of Sumter, SC to investigate a chilling case where a young boy was tragically shot and killed on a front doorstep while trick-or-treating on Halloween.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: When Paula's young autistic son Michael, with limited verbal skills uttered the words "Go away scary dead boy" -- it sent a chill up her spine.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fury
programme.desc: Kathy, her two daughters and her new husband, "Farmer" thought they had the perfect, quiet life deep in the mountains of West Virginia.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Man of the House
programme.desc: PRS is called to help a grandmother and her frightened grandson when renovations on her 19th century house stir up the pipe-smoking specter of a former tenant named Alfred.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Knickerbocker
programme.desc: PRS checks into the Knickerbocker Hotel in Linesville, Pennsylvania where the owners are reporting strange noises and the appearance of phantom children in some of the rooms.

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT2
programme.desc: Most Haunted's deadliest investigation, Part 2. Spirits emerging, team's resolve tested as darkness envelops. Growing fear, team's safety at stake. Can they continue?

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: Yvette and the Most Haunted team are invited to the inner sanctum of the Freemasons to investigate the many ghost sightings at Clifton Hall. Even before the investigation starts the team are faced with some of strange phenomena witnessed by others.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: Part two of their investigation into Clifton Hall sees the team splitting with going it alone. For one of the team the night becomes terrifying as they find themselves locked in a room with an unseen force.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: Yvette and her team take on their largest investigation to date. They have been invited to investigate a large estate where it seems just about every building has a ghostly tale.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Love and Marriage - Part 1
programme.desc: Bickering couples go on a trip to learn what it was that brought them together.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Love and Marriage - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark work to keep the three couples together.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Code Name: FREAK

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: When Apollo and Starbuck intercept a primitive ship floating through space, the young warriors discover that its inhabitants, who are in suspended animation, represent a direct link to Earth.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: South East England

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Yorkshire

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: SW London

programme.title: World's Greatest: Archipelagos
programme.desc: The romantic notion of island life has always attracted us. Explore the histories, cultures, and unique ways of life on the World’s Greatest Archipelagos - clusters of islands that share common bonds of geography, geology, and genealogy.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Rivers
programme.desc: Rivers flow freely - beautiful and powerful waterways that underscore the melody of life. As they meander through the landscape, they shape it, wearing down ranges and deepening valleys, eventually flowing out into the sea.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Treks
programme.desc: Every journey made by foot promises a grand adventure. From the highest mountains to the wildest jungle realms, treks venture down the road less travelled, allowing us to connect to nature, history, and culture, one step at a time.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Cruises
programme.desc: There is something seductive about setting sail. Cruises offer us a chance to dip our toes into the 70% of our planet awash with oceans, rivers, and lakes, exploring places that can only be reached by daring to leave the shore.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Flights
programme.desc: Our experience of the world’s greatest marvels is literally and figuratively elevated when we explore them from the air. Whether you travel by air balloon, helicopter, light aircraft, a grand perspective is always guaranteed.

programme.title: Arthur: To Tibble the Truth/Waiting to Go
programme.desc: When the Tibble Twins' constant lying lands them in constant trouble, they promise to tell only the truth. Binky and Brain collide on the soccer field, breaking Brain's new watch and nearly breaking their friendship.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'S Imaginary Friend/Arthur's Lost Library Book
programme.desc: Someone only D.W. can see has moved in with the Reads. Her name is Nadine, and she follows D.W. everywhere. Arthur is the first to get the new Scare-Your-Pants-Off book from the library. Unfortunately, he can't figure out where he put it!

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur and The Real Mr. Ratburn/Arthur's Spelling Trubble
programme.desc: It's the first day of third grade and Arthur's biggest fear has come true--his new teacher is the dreaded Mr. Ratburn. Then, it’s time for the all-school spellathon. Arthur is chosen to compete, and he finds facing Prunella and The Brain!

programme.title: Arthur: Fernlets by Fern/Prunella and the Haunted Locker
programme.desc: Muffy talks Fern into writing poems for a new line of greeting cards which becomes the hit of Elwood City, but booming business causes Fern to burn out. Prunella is assigned a new school locker, which is rumored to be haunted!

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., All Fired Up/I'd Rather Read It Myself
programme.desc: When Ms. Morgan announces they'll be having a fire drill during preschool, D.W. wants no part of it--it sounds way too scary. Then, the Tibble Twins are better than D.W. at just about everything.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. All Wet/Buster's Dino Dilemma
programme.desc: The Reads are having a wonderful time at the beach, except for D.W. who simply refuses to have fun. Next, Buster and Arthur make a long-awaited field trip to a dinosaur excavation.

programme.title: Arthur: The Blackout/Mei Lin Takes a Stand
programme.desc: It's a hot day in Elwood City, and a total blackout leaves its residents without electricity! Will Arthur and DW survive without AC and TV? Binky's baby sister Mei-Lin isn't keen on learning to walk and would rather stick to crawling.

programme.title: Arthur: George Scraps His Sculpture/Arthur's Big Meltdown
programme.desc: George creates a piece of art for the county-wide art show with the help of guest artist Kevin Sampson. Then, Arthur must learn how to control his temper after getting angry over a pair of sneakers!

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Time Trouble/Buster's Amish Mismatch
programme.desc: D.W. is tired of being bossed around all the time and demands to know why she couldn't have been born before Arthur! And during a trip to Amish country, Buster becomes enamored with the simple life and vows to forgo modern conveniences.

programme.title: War Story: Where Hell is: The Leopold and the Scheldt
programme.desc: The Allies liberated Antwerp, the world’s largest deep-water port, on 4 September 1944, but it could only be accessed via the Scheldt Estuary, the perfect place for the Germans to make a stand.

programme.title: War Story
programme.desc: In April and May 1945, the long-suffering Dutch people, enduring the German-imposed Hongerwinter famine, enthusiastically welcomed their Canadian liberators, establishing the intense connection sustained for 70 years.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Lost Tanks of D-Day
programme.desc: In Normandy, June 6, 1944, a dozen Sherman tanks equipped with floats, the famous Duplex Drives (DD), leave their ship to swim to Omaha Beach... not all of them make it.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Last Flight of the B-17
programme.desc: Twenty-six metres beneath the waves at the foot of the majestic Calvi Citadel in Corsica lies an American plane from the Second World War.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: Secret Bunkers of Omaha Beach
programme.desc: On June 6th 1944, Lieutenant-colonel Rudder’s Rangers company climbs the cliffs of the Pointe du Hoc in Normandy with the mission to destroy the German cannons.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Kristen
programme.desc: Mike met Kristen on Facebook. They quickly forged a deep connection, but Mike's frequent efforts to meet Kristen have been futile. Will Mike finally get face-to-face with Kristen?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Miracle & Javonni
programme.desc: Smart, single mum Miracle fell for Javonni, a dreamy-eyed Instagrammer. With Max on hiatus, Nev teams up with TV personality Charlamagne to take Miracle on a hunt for the man of her dreams. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Miranda & Cameryn
programme.desc: After years of online chats Miranda discovered that Cameryn was not the man he claimed to be. She confronted him only to be given another suspicious profile. Is he someone else entirely?

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Nick & Melissa
programme.desc: Nick and Melissa fell in love at age 12 when they met on an online chat room. Now 18, Nick is ready to meet Melissa. But is Melissa the real deal or has Nick been entangled in lies?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: For years, Nicole has had her pictures stolen to make fake profiles, one of which has been catfishing Ryan for ten years. Ryan and Nicole are unsure whether it's a random troll, or they have a common enemy.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Natalee Holloway: New Clues In Paradise
programme.desc: A report on new details into the search for Natalee Holloway, a U.S. teenager who disappeared on May 30, 2005 during a post-graduation trip in the Caribbean island of Aruba.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Secrets of Waco
programme.desc: The 25th anniversary of the deadly standoff in Waco, Texas; a retired United Parcel Service driver reveals his experiences with cult leader David Koresh; a former ATF agent tells about his involvement.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live To Tell: River's Edge
programme.desc: On January 8, 2000, college students Danielle Keener and Dan Zapp were on a date, walking along a river’s edge outside York, Pennsylvania, when they were kidnapped at gunpoint by a man in a pick-up truck.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Law and Mrs. Shelton
programme.desc: A report on Catherine Mehaffey Shelton, a criminal defense attorney from Dallas. She has been practicing law in Texas for nearly three decades and making headlines for nearly as long, primarily because strange things happen to the men in her life.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fight For The Truth
programme.desc: 17-year-old Marty Tankleff was convicted of murdering his adoptive parents in their home. Marty initially confessed, but quickly recanted. He has fought for years for his innocence, as new witnesses have surfaced who could potentially exonerate him.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: Afraid of the Dark
programme.desc: A woman spends almost two decades searching for the man who kidnapped her from her bedroom and left her for dead when she was 8 years old.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Echo of Yesterday
programme.desc: The resurgence of neo-Nazism in Germany takes the IMF to Bavaria, where Marcus von Frank (Hans Gudegast) threatens to become a second Hitler.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Photographer
programme.desc: The imagination of the IMF is put to the test when a massive spy ring in the U.S. headed by fashion photographer, David Redding, threatens to cripple the country with a deadly pneumonic plague.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Spy
programme.desc: NATO's missile defense system plans, mapped on two separate overlays for security reasons, are the target of a Central European spy organization.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Game of Chess
programme.desc: Recovering a million dollars in gold bullion is the job of the IMF.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Emerald
programme.desc: The IMF is assigned to recover microfilm plans for manipulating international gold reserves.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop forgets to say "please" and "thank you". Riff shares his dream of becoming an inventor.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Emperor's Contest - The Whole Truth
programme.desc: Everyone is excited about a fishing contest that is being held in the park; everyone except Ryan, who doesn't want to follow the contest rules. When Ryan is tempted not to follow the rules, Barney tells a story called "The Emperor's Contest."

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Caring Hearts
programme.desc: A special project provides the perfect opportunity for Barney, Baby Bop and BJ to learn about love and relationships the "heart" way as they make a "Friends and Family Tree."

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Playing Games - No, No, No!
programme.desc: Baby Bop has trouble following the rules and taking turns while playing games. Barney and Riff help her learn how to follow the rules. In the end, Baby Bop and BJ have fun playing together, and Baby Bop learns that rules make games fun for everyone!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Three Lines, Three Corners
programme.desc: Barney and his friends play hopscotch—with a twist. Whitney is learning about triangles at school, so Angela created Triangle Hopscotch to help reinforce "triangles."

programme.title: Barney and Friends: It's Hot! It's Cold!
programme.desc: Throughout the day, Barney and the children learn about "hot" and "cold," but the fun really begins when Barney turns the playground into a winter/summer wonderland!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Three kids try to build a pretend farm with disastrous results because they won't work together. Barney and his friends try to cheer up Olivia.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop can't find anybody to play with her. When the others see her feeling sad, they decide to play whatever she wants to play. The dinos and kids are planning a camp-out at the park.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: It's Raining Ton
programme.desc: The guys take Big Sis to her first auction - and when things get ugly, she becomes their secret weapon. Ton tests out a "blob" and Allen gets shot with a riot gun.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Unsinkable Ton
programme.desc: Unique finds lead the guys to some cool sales. They try to authenticate props from the film Titanic, Ton faces off with a rattler during a snakebite kit sale, and Allen gets into ice carving while unloading some chainsaws.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Early Bird Special
programme.desc: Vintage Shooting Star carnival game; professional Mixed Martial Arts octagon fighting cage.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Jersey Score
programme.desc: Ton & Allen attend a silent auction in NJ, but that doesn't stop the local buyers from letting them know they're not welcome! They uncover a skeet throwing machine from the 1960's & a vintage vehicle with some real horsepower!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Real Thing
programme.desc: Allen and Ton compete with a notorious deep-pocketed bidder in Oxnard, CA, and score a vintage Coca-Cola vending machine, a vintage desk and a rare 1971 GMC truck.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: Ton and Allen quarrel over bidding strategy at a rare auction on Catalina Island and must race against the clock to unload a one man submersible that could be worth big money… if they can make it work.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Driller Instinct
programme.desc: Ton & Allen encounter aggressive outdoorsmen in the Alaskan wilderness. The guys discover an 8-wheeled ATV that travels on both land & water and an air percussion hammer that can drill through solid rock!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Shuffle
programme.desc: Ton and Allen teach a cocky new auction hunter a lesson. They spot a 1940's-era shuffleboard table and uncover an early hot rod made from the fuel tank of a WWII fighter plane!

programme.title: Teen Mom: Pros and Cons
programme.desc: Amber and Gary try to get the no-contact order lifted; Maci wants to cut Ryan out of her life; Farrah makes an unexpected choice; Butch moves in with Catelynn and Tyler.

programme.title: Teen Mom
programme.desc: Part 1. Dr. Drew hosts the four Teen Moms in front of a live studio audience. In part one of the finale, Farrah and Amber reflect on the past year of motherhood.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Finale Special: Check Up With Dr. Drew Part 2
programme.desc: In the dramatic conclusion of the finale, Dr. Drew hosts the four Teen Moms in front of a live studio audience. Catelynn and Maci discuss the all the family problems they faced in series 3.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: New Season, Old Wounds
programme.desc: Briana, frustrated by Luis' absence, tracks him down at a nightclub. After a major fight with her mum, things get even worse for Jade at Kloie's birthday party. (S10, ep1)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: About Last Night
programme.desc: Isaac makes a confession to Kailyn, prompting her to reconsider her custody agreement with Jo. Jade is forced to juggle single-parenthood while preparing for her beauty license exam. (S10, ep2)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Blood and Water
programme.desc: Briana takes an STI test after her night with Luis. Chelsea takes Aubree out for a mother-daughter day. Leah and Victoria visit her boyfriend in Costa Rica. (S10, ep3)

programme.desc: The team investigates the killing of the judge in the trial of a Russian mobster.

programme.title: CSI: NY

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A role-playing game turns lethal, with one player falling victim to a bona fide killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team are called to a fashion boutique when a young girl is killed in an explosion.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a shooter targets where Delko is staying, Horatio has to look into Delko's past.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Poison Pill

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Skeletons

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Atonement
programme.desc: Sandoval goes to Renee to request a trial to testify to atrocities against humanity committed by the Taelons. A manhunt for Sandoval begins when he quits and leaves the mother ship. Liam has to protect him on his way to the grand jury.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Blood Ties
programme.desc: Strange assaults and several deaths may be related to a Doors/Taelon joint venture where Taelon core energy was used to heal people. It appears that the energy is being sucked back out of the patients.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Hearts and Minds
programme.desc: When Renee's boyfriend appears to her while he is imprisoned on the mother ship, Liam theorizes a special energy bond between the pair. Zo'or is upset by the human's betrayal and bans all humans from the mother ship.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Epiphany
programme.desc: The Taelons announce that they will all go into death stasis and wait on the mother ship for humans to discover how to create core energy and revive them. Zo'or and Da'an don't trust each other to be the last to submit to stasis.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dark Horizons
programme.desc: Eight Taelons are killed when protectors' implants are re-calibrated with a new imperative to kill instead of protect Taelons. They fear the Jiridians have found a way to control the CVIs. Meanwhile, their core energy continues to deplete.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Point of No Return
programme.desc: When Street solves the 8th dimension of Ma'el's riddle, a beacon leads Liam to a chamber with a healing pool. However, there is only enough in the healing pool to help 6 Taelons. Zo'or will do anything to insure his own life.

programme.title: The Lost World: True Spirit
programme.desc: Veronica and Marguerite use a ouija board to communicate with Malone, who Veronica believes is trapped in a spirit realm. However, their attempt may have aroused the spirit of Saros, a dead warlord.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Knife
programme.desc: Malone's time in the spirit realm has given him psychic abilities. When he and Challenger discover a morbid campsite, Malone is encouraged to use his new powers to solve the case of Jack the Ripper.

programme.title: The Lost World: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: A dying stranger issues a warning to three of the explorers, begging them to find a hunter named Pierson Rice. Roxton shares a common, painful past with the mysterious Rice.

programme.title: The Lost World: Dead Man's Hill
programme.desc: Roxton stumbles into a bizarre Wild West alternate reality when he finds his name on a tombstone. Roxton meets the other explorers' pioneer-town personas.

programme.title: The Lost World: Hollow Victory
programme.desc: Challenger experiments with a new fuel source in the hot-air balloon, and takes the other explorers along for a test ride. However, a storm drags the balloon into a dangerous underground world.

programme.title: The Lost World: A Witch's Calling
programme.desc: While Roxton and Malone search for the missing Veronica, two young witches lure them away from safety. Unbeknownst to the explorers, a sorceress and her disciples plot to destroy Challenger.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Seeing Red
programme.desc: Sassi attends an anger management course. Ste hits a low point as he upsets both Amber and Kirsty. Shannon decides to rekindle an old romance and Chloe and Jordan welcome a new addition. (S4, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harlin
programme.desc: Julie and Oobah uncover more than they were expecting, as their search to help Emma find her online love Harlin takes a sinister turn. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Angelica & Jeroen
programme.desc: Angelica's been speaking to Jeroen online for three and a half years. After several failed attempts to meet, she's now desperate to find out if Jeroen is real? (S2, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Esther & Theo
programme.desc: Esther's finally found her match in Theo. But he always refuses to video call. So it's up to Julia and Oobah to find out if Theo is who he says he is. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harry
programme.desc: After six months, single mum Emma and online love Harry have already set a wedding date. But the problem is, they've never met. So it's up to the Catfish UK team to track him down. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: The investigation of the September 24, 1988 sexual torture-murder in Louisville, Kentucky, of Brenda Sue Schaefer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: In September 1999, Brian Eftenoff of Phoenix, Az. Was convicted of murdering his wife, Judi. It was alleged that Eftenoff forced more than a gram of cocaine down his wife’s throat causing her to die of a cocaine-induced stroke.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Eleven Hundred Miles to Murder
programme.desc: Authorities first suspect the husband in the savage murder of a Florida doctor, but when he has an alibi, they follow a tip on a 1,100 mile trip that takes the case in an unexpected direction.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Alternate Suspects
programme.desc: A football coach serves nine years in prison for the murder of his wife before a Texas Court of Criminal Appeals finds he didn't get a fair trial.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A report on the hunt for a serial killer suspected of murdering three young women from Los Angeles, California to Chicago, Illinois.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Sugar Land Conspiracy
programme.desc: In December 2003, the Whitaker family-- Kent, his wife Tricia, and their sons, Bart and Kevin-- returned home from dinner. Upon entering the house, Kevin and Tricia were fatally shot. The investigation revealed that the murders had been planned by Bart.
